PHRASE.LANG: kName
Mr Ska Bones
Mr Ska Bones
Mr. Ska Bones
Mr. Ska Bones
Sr. Calavera
ミスター スカ・ボーン
미스터 스카 본스
Mr Ska Bones
骷髏先生
骷髏先生
Mr Ska Bones
kDesc
He's not that well-connected/ And sometimes he loses his head/ But Mr Ska Bones is a good guy/ Although he's bony and dead. [#Legal]
Il n'est pas si bien connecté / Et parfois il perd sa tête / Mais Mr Ska Bones est un bon gars / Bien qu'il soit osseux et mort. [#Legal]
Er ist etwas klapprig/ Und manchmal verliert seinen Kopf/ Doch Mr. Ska Bones ist ein korrekter Typ/ Auch wenn er knochig und tot ist. [#Legal]
Non è ben collegato/ E a volte perde la testa / Ma Mr. Ska Bones è un bravo ragazzo / Anche se è ossuto e morto. [#Legal]
No está muy bien conectado./ Y en ocasiones acaba descabezado./ Pero el Sr. Calavera buen tipo es./ A pesar de sus huesos y su pálida tez. [#Legal]
体少し不安定です。たまに頭とれます。それでも凄くいい性格の持ち主です。 [#Legal]
관절이 헐렁거려서 / 가끔은 머리도 잃어버리지만 / 스카 본스는 좋은 친구입니다 / 뼈만 남은 해골임에도 [#Legal]
He's not that well-connected/ And sometimes he loses his head/ But Mr Ska Bones is a good guy/ Although he's bony and dead. [#Legal]
天生個性散漫/有時腦袋空空/骷髏先生好心腸/雖然早已上天堂。[#Legal]
天生個性散漫/有時腦袋空空/骷髏先生好心腸/雖然早已上天堂。[#Legal]
He's not that well-connected/ And sometimes he loses his head/ But Mr Ska Bones is a good guy/ Although he's bony and dead. [#Legal]
